name: voygen-api
description: Voygen API server for Render.com hosting

scripts.build: npm run install-librechat && npm run patch-librechat-ui && npm run build-all
scripts.install-librechat: npm run clone-librechat && npm run setup-librechat
scripts.setup-librechat: cd librechat && NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm ci --include=dev && cd client && npm i -D @vitejs/plugin-react vite && npm i && cd .. && NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm i -D rollup rollup-plugin-typescript2 @rollup/plugin-alias @rollup/plugin-typescript @rollup/plugin-node-resolve rollup-plugin-peer-deps-external @rollup/plugin-commonjs @rollup/plugin-replace @rollup/plugin-terser @rollup/plugin-json rollup-plugin-postcss @types/js-yaml && cd packages/data-provider && npm i -D rollup rollup-plugin-typescript2 && cd ../data-schemas && npm i -D rollup rollup-plugin-typescript2 && cd ../.. && npm i @smithy/signature-v4 @smithy/types @smithy/protocol-http @aws-crypto/sha256-js tslib --no-audit --no-fund && node -e "const fs=require(\"fs\");const f=\"client/package.json\";const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f,\"utf8\"));if(j.scripts&&j.scripts.build&&j.scripts.build.includes(\" vite build\")&&!j.scripts.build.includes(\" npx vite build\")){j.scripts.build=j.scripts.build.replace(\" vite build\",\" npx vite build\");fs.writeFileSync(f,JSON.stringify(j,null,2));console.log(\"Patched client build to use npx vite\");} else {console.log(\"No patch needed for client build\");}" && cp ../librechat.yaml . && cd ..
scripts.build-all: tsc && cd librechat && npm run frontend && cd ..

author: Voygen Team
